selected_quotes: For (I hope) the last time. Xigris does not work in sepsis.
XIGRIS, ese medicamento de 8000 € por paciente que no es más eficaz que el placebo.
This week's #twitjc - a return to the topic of sepsis with Drotrecogin Alfa (Activated) in Adults with Septic Shock -
You knew activated protein C was out...now, here's the published proof

citation.abstract: There have been conflicting reports on the efficacy of recombinant human activated protein C, or drotrecogin alfa (activated) (DrotAA), for the treatment of patients with septic shock.
citation.title: Drotrecogin Alfa (Activated) in Adults with Septic Shock

facebook.title: Drotrecogin Alfa (Activated) in Adults with Septic Shock
facebook.summary:
NEJM Online First May 22 www.zBlox.com

"CONCLUSIONS
DrotAA did not significantly reduce mortality at 28 or 90 days, as compared with placebo, in patients with septic shock. 
(Funded by Eli Lilly; PROWESS-SHOCK ClinicalTrials.gov number, NCT00604214.)"
